posts._title: Dan Pita – Rochia alba de dantela AKA The White Lace Dress (1989)
posts.title: Rochia alba de dantela
posts.excerpt: A doctor, a sculptor and a football player trying to win the love of desenatoare models, suffering from incurable disease. But this does not preclude it from working on hand in a clothes factory. Of the three candidate, the young woman prefers the more modest, based with the family.

posts._title: Jean Rouch – Moi, un noir AKA I, a Negro (1958)
posts.title: Moi, un noir
posts.excerpt: A group of young Nigerians leave the savannah to work in the Ivory Coast. They end up in Treichville, a poor quarter of Abidjan, lost and rootless in modern civilisation. The hero, who narrates his own story, calls himself Edward J. Robinson in homage to the American actor. Like him, his friends have adopted pseudonyms …

posts._title: Elyer Ishmukhamedov – Vlyublyonnye aka The Lovers (1970)
posts.title: Vlyublyonnye
posts.excerpt: Quote:A romance film directed by Elyer Ishmukhamedov, starring Anastasiya Vertinskaya, Rustam Sagdullayev, Gyuzal Apanayeva, and Karen Khachaturyan.

posts._title: Seth Holt – Taste of Fear AKA Scream of Fear (1961)
posts.title: Taste of Fear
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Penny Applebee’s parents were divorced when she was quite young and she grew up with her mother. After her mother’s death, the wheelchair-bound Penny has accepted her father’s invitation to live with him. She arrives only to learn that her father is away though her stepmother – who she is meeting for the first time …

posts._title: Pierre-Alain Jolivet – Le Grand Ceremonial aka Weird Weirdo (1968)
posts.title: Le Grand Ceremonial
posts.excerpt: IMDB:When a boy is the victim of his over-protective mother, he leaves his home at night in search of female victims. When he meets a young girl who is a petty thief, he mistreats her and she falls in love with him.

posts.title: Tesnota
posts.excerpt: 1998, Nalchik, the North Caucasus, Russia.24-year-old Ilana works in her father’s garage to help him make ends meet. One evening, her extended family and friends gather to celebrate the engagement of her younger brother David. Later that night, the young couple is kidnapped, and a ransom demand delivered.In this close-knit Jewish enclave, involving the police …

posts._title: Yoshimitsu Morita – Mohou-han AKA Copycat Killer (2002)
posts.title: Mohou-han
posts.excerpt: This horrifying thriller, which stars Smap member Masahiro Nakai revolves around a lunatic killer who announces his crimes before he carries them out! All victims are killed in hideous ways, most of them being tortured before death. This nerve-wrecking shocker will leave you sitting on the edge of your seat until its startling climax!

posts.title: Shockproof
posts.excerpt: Quote:After having served 5 years in prison, for killing a man while defending her disreputable lover, Harry (John Baragrey), Jenny Marsh (Patricia Knight) is set for parole. Her parole officer, Griff Marat Cornel Wilde is determined to make Jenny go straight. For lack of other prospects Griff finds Jenny a job in his own home, …

posts._title: Kon Ichikawa – Kagi AKA The Key AKA Odd Obsession (1959) (HD)
posts.title: Kagi
posts.excerpt: Winner of Cannes’ Special Jury Prize, Odd Obsession is one of acclaimed director Kon Ichikawa’s (Tokyo Olympiad, The Burmese Harp) greatest works. This captivating blend of comic satire and drama follows an elderly man’s attempts to satisfy his younger wife (Machiko Kyo, Rashomon, Gate of Hell). When “potency” injections fail, Mr. Kenmochi incites his own …

posts.title: Cassandro, the Exotico!
posts.excerpt: ACID Cannes 2018—After 26 years of spinning dives and flying uppercuts on the ring, Cassandro, the star of the gender-bending cross-dressing Mexican wrestlers known as the Exoticos, is far from retiring. But with dozens of broken bones and metal pins in his body, he must now reinvent himself…
